page.title: 07HOUSING
page.content: However,a lot of houses in the 2nd category are intermingled & less densely packed.Virtually all Council- owned houses in the area are in Balsall Heath.{Moseley}is also a mixture of housing types,having a mixture of the 2nd & 3rd categories. Some parts have large houses & gardens,e.g. the{Parklands}area of {Cannon Hill;}there are also areas of semi-detatched housing with quite small gardens{.Selly Park}&{Edgbaston contain almost all 3rd category houses.This is largely due to the covenants imposed by the{Selly Park & {Calthorpe estates}.These state that each house must have grounds of no less than one and a quarter acres.
